antgroup/echomimic

audio-driven portrait animation with editable facial landmarks

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Uses a photo, audio, and hand poses to make an animation video with talking and gestures
  • realtime talking head synthesis using motion-space diffusion
  • Audio-driven synthesis for portrait image animation
  • AI image editing with brush and prompt
  • audio-driven video dubbing with unlimited length and accurate lip sync
  • Generates long 4K portrait animations from a single image and audio, with optional text prompts for expression control
  • text-to-speech library for generating voices with controllable style and speaker traits
  • automates 2D lip sync animation from audio for games and cartoons
  • Generates facial animation from audio
